snippet: Dwyane Wade got the ball in the corner, took a dribble to his left and stepped back for the dagger 3-pointer....
lead_paragraph: Dwyane Wade got the ball in the corner, took a dribble to his left and stepped back for the dagger 3-pointer.

headline.main: Wade Scores 22 in Chicago Debut, Bulls Beat Celtics 105-99
headline.print_headline: Wade Scores 22 in Chicago Debut, Bulls Beat Celtics 105-99
